attributes.name: model-value
attributes.desc: binding value, if it is an range picker, the length of the array should be 2

attributes.name: v-model
attributes.desc: binding value, if it is an range picker, the length of the array should be 2

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.desc: whether DatePicker is read only

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.desc: whether DatePicker is disabled

attributes.name: editable
attributes.desc: whether the input is editable

attributes.name: clearable
attributes.desc: whether to show clear button

attributes.name: size
attributes.desc: size of Input

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.desc: placeholder in non-range mode

attributes.name: start-placeholder
attributes.desc: placeholder for the start date in range mode

attributes.name: end-placeholder
attributes.desc: placeholder for the end date in range mode

attributes.name: arrow-control
attributes.desc: whether to pick time using arrow buttons

attributes.name: type
attributes.desc: type of the picker
attributes.optionValue: year | month | date | datetime | week | datetimerange | daterange

attributes.name: format
attributes.desc: format of the displayed value in the input box

attributes.name: popper-class
attributes.desc: custom class name for DateTimePicker's dropdown

attributes.name: popper-style
attributes.desc: custom style for DateTimePicker's dropdown

attributes.name: popper-options
attributes.desc: Customized popper option see more at popper.js

attributes.name: fallback-placements
attributes.desc: list of possible positions for Tooltip popper.js(2.8.4)

attributes.name: placement
attributes.desc: position of dropdown(2.8.4)

attributes.name: range-separator
attributes.desc: range separator

attributes.name: default-value
attributes.desc: optional, default date of the calendar

attributes.name: default-time
attributes.desc: the default time value after picking a date. Time 00:00:00 will be used if not specified

attributes.name: value-format
attributes.desc: optional, format of binding value. If not specified, the binding value will be a Date object

attributes.name: date-format
attributes.desc: optional, format of the date displayed in input's inner panel(2.4.0)

attributes.name: time-format
attributes.desc: optional, format of the time displayed in input's inner panel(2.4.0)

attributes.name: id
attributes.desc: same as id in native input

attributes.name: name
attributes.desc: same as name in native input

attributes.name: unlink-panels
attributes.desc: unlink two date-panels in range-picker

attributes.name: prefix-icon
attributes.desc: Custom prefix icon component

attributes.name: clear-icon
attributes.desc: Custom clear icon component

attributes.name: shortcuts
attributes.desc: an object array to set shortcut options
attributes.optionValue: Array<{ text: string, value: Date | Function }>

attributes.name: disabled-date
attributes.desc: a function determining if a date is disabled with that date as its parameter. Should return a Boolean

attributes.name: disabled-hours
attributes.desc: To specify the array of hours that cannot be selected

attributes.name: disabled-minutes
attributes.desc: To specify the array of minutes that cannot be selected
attributes.optionValue: (hour: number, role: string, comparingDate?: Dayjs) => number[]

attributes.name: disabled-seconds
attributes.desc: To specify the array of seconds that cannot be selected
attributes.optionValue: (hour: number, minute: number, role: string, comparingDate?: Dayjs) => number[]

attributes.name: cell-class-name
attributes.desc: set custom className

attributes.name: teleported
attributes.desc: whether datetime-picker dropdown is teleported to the body

attributes.name: empty-values
attributes.desc: empty values of component, [see config-provider](/en-US/component/config-provider#empty-values-configurations)(2.7.0)

attributes.name: value-on-clear
attributes.desc: clear return value, [see config-provider](/en-US/component/config-provider#empty-values-configurations)(2.7.0)

attributes.name: show-now
attributes.desc: whether to show the now button(2.8.7)

attributes.name: show-footer
attributes.desc: whether to show footer where the date picker is one ^[enum]'datetime' \| 'datetimerange'(2.10.5)

attributes.name: show-confirm
attributes.desc: whether to show the confirm button(2.11.0)

attributes.name: show-week-number
attributes.desc: show the week number besides the week(2.10.3)

events.name: @change
events.desc: triggers when user confirms the value or click outside

events.name: @clear
events.desc: triggers when the clear icon is clicked in a clearable DateTimePicker(2.7.7)

events.name: @calendar-change
events.desc: triggers when the calendar selected date is changed. Only for `range`

events.name: @panel-change
events.desc: triggers when the navigation button click.
events.param: Function(date: Date | [Date, Date, mode: month | year, view?: string) => void

events.name: @visible-change
events.desc: triggers when the DateTimePicker's dropdown appears/disappears
